--- kalmantech <kalmantech@...> wrote:

> Has any research on NEAT performance verse float
> precision
> been done?  We are looking at a number of embedded
> applications
> and our processing platform is limited to single
> precision floats.

ALL of my ANN work has been with 32-bit floats.  I
think it would be hard to find an application where
more than 32 bits would be helpful.

I used 32-bit floats to reduce execution time.
